title: Eat Da Burger!
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!).

title: Employee Directory
description: An Employee Directory application created with React that allows the user to view their entire employee directory at once so that they have quick access to their information.

title: JavaScript Quiz
description: Responsive web application that gives users a timed quiz and records high scores.

title: Note Taker
description: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application uses an express backend and saves and retrieves note data from a JSON file.

title: Password Generator
description: Web application that generates a random password based on user-selected criteria.

title: Progressive Budget
description: A Budget Tracker application that allows the user to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without data/internet connection.

title: README.md Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input using the Inquirer package.

title: Travel Companion
description: Web application used to simulate the cultural experience of traveling while stuck at home in quarantine.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Web application using the OpenWeather API to display current and future weather data.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: WrappIt
description: Web application that helps relieve the angst of trying to figure out what to buy our loved ones for the holidays.
